thread.title: Clean, friendly and convenient - Review
thread.title_full: Clean, friendly and convenient - Review of Premier Inn London Angel Islington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: rhm1965
title: Clean, friendly and convenient - Review
text: Stayed here for one night in February 2017. Hotel is in a great location, was clean , staff were friendly and helpful, it is also inexpensive and secure. A typical premier inn, bed was comfortable , hotel was quiet and got a good nights sleep. Two minutes walk from The Angel underground
